resource.description: Samples are collected daily at locations throughout the distribution system by city personnel. Samples are taken to a lab to be analyzed for Total Coliform and E. Coli indicators. All positive samples since 2011 are provided in this dataset.

Notes about addresses or sample information, if applicable.
Positive indicates E. Coli present in the sample.

Bacteria Sample Data
resource.description: Samples are taken daily at locations throughout the distribution system. Temperature, pH, and Total Chlorine Residual are collected by city personnel. Samples are taken to a lab to be analyzed for Total Coliform and E. Coli indicators. Results are returned to the city the following business day.
columns_description: Bacteria Samples are routine and collected every 30 days. If a sample has an error, is rejected, or has bacteria present, a replacement sample is taken. This column indicates if the sample is a replacement. Special Samples are locations that are not normally sampled. Refer to the notes section to determine why sample was taken.
Provides results from the laboratory to indicate pass, fail, or if sample was rejected.
The level of chlorine disinfectant by measuring chloramines (minimum requirement is .5 mg/L). Instruments have an accuracy of plus or minus 0.1 mg/L.
Street name for where water sample was collected.
Number of samples taken at the location.
Indicates the location of replacement samples, special samples, or any notes associated with the sample.
The amount of free chlorine as measured in mg/L. This number increases in Feb/Mar during the chlorine maintenance period. Instruments have an accuracy of plus or minus 0.1 mg/L.
Date test was conducted.
Unique identifier for the bacteria sample site.

resource.name: Lead & Copper Samples
columns_description: Number of samples collected at the location.
Location ID assigned by TCEQ
Concentration of copper measured in mg/L.
Concentration of lead measured in mg/L. If the level of lead was less than the reporting level of 0.0005 mg/L, the value blank.
Laboratory identification number for the sample.
Sample collection date
Street where sample is collected

columns_description: The level of nitrites as measured in mg/L. Instruments have an accuracy of plus or minus 0.01 mg/L.
Daily Residual samples only test for total chlorine residuals. Water Quality samples test for all parameters.
The amount of free ammonia as measured in mg/L. Instruments have an accuracy of plus or minus 0.1 mg/L.
Date test was conducted.
The amount of calcium carbonate measured in mg/L.
The level of nitrates as measured in mg/L. Instruments have an accuracy of plus or minus 0.1 mg/L.
Measured in degrees Celsius.
The amount of monochloramine as measured in mg/L. Instruments have an accuracy of plus or minus 0.15 mg/L.
The amount of free chlorine as measured in mg/L. This number increases in Feb/Mar during the chlorine maintenance period. Instruments have an accuracy of plus or minus 0.1 mg/L.
The level of chlorine disinfectant by measuring chloramines. Instruments have an accuracy of plus or minus 0.1 mg/L.
Street location water sample was conducted.
The location type the sample was taken. FH indicates sample location was a fire hydrant.

resource.name: Parks and Recreation Attendance Data
resource.description: This data set contains information on the Parks and Recreation attendance. The letters contained within parentheses in the top row denote more information about where the data comes from. From left to right, the parentheses stand for the following: (T) - Total, (AQ) - Aquatics Program, (ADATH) - Adult Athletics, (CAR) Carpenter Park Recreation Center, (LIB) - Liberty Recreation Center, (OAK) - Oak Point Center, (OUT) - Outdoor Program, (SEN) - Senior Center, (TR) - Therapeutic Recreation, (TOM) - The Tom Muehlenbeck Center
resource.attribution: The City of Plano Department of Parks and Recreation

resource.name: List of Capital Projects
resource.description: List of Capital Projects in City of Plano
columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Zip Codes' (kdib-r4zg) the point in column 'latlong' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.name: TTHM & HAA5 Quarterly Rolling Averages
resource.description: Total Trihalomethanes (TTHM) and Haloacetic Acids (HAA5) are disinfection byproducts that are monitored quarterly by the Texas Commission on Environmental Quality (TCEQ). The results in this data set are calculated quarterly averages by site using the results from each sample location. Sample data for each location is available on the TTHM and HAA5 pages.
columns_description: A 1 value indicates the rolling average at the location is below the TTHM MCL of 80 ug/L.
Calculated rolling quarterly average for HAA5 (in ug/L) for the current and previous three sample dates.
Sample Site Location
Date of samples last taken that is used in the calculated rolling quarterly average.
A 1 value indicates the rolling average at the location is below the HAA5 MCL of 60 ug/L.
Calculated rolling quarterly average for TTHM (in ug/L) for the current and previous three sample dates.

resource.name: Plano PSC Data 030315
columns_description: Caller initial ring time

resource.name: 2014-15 By Month & YTD Texas Pure Products Revenue
Plano Fix It Completions
resource.description:
This dataset contains information on the Plano Fix It Program. The program information has been edited from its original output in two ways:

1) ID numbers and Addresses of Projects have been removed for privacy reasons. 
2) The raw data has been grouped into months based on the date of the Fix It request. Within 2015, there have been more than 8,000 requests. The large volume of individual data points puts a strain on viewing via the Dashboard and has been reduced in order to provide a smoother user experience. 

Additionally, this data is representative of only 2015 requests. Currently, more requests and completions are occurring for the new year. 

Lastly, this dataset is organized as follows: The first several columns show date and total numbers for project completions, requests, in-progress, etc. The latter columns breakdown the total numbers by the type of service requested whether it is for water violations, animal services, public works projects, etc.

resource.name: Finance Department Goals

resource.name: Development Value Inflation
resource.description:
This data set contains information on housing values, housing value growth, and indicators with which to compare.  

The data for this set stems from the City of Plano Comprehensive Annual Financial Report (2014 & 2013) in addition to data points from the usinflationcalculator.com.
columns_description: Year but coded to be used in date-unusable functions
